title: Create Zayora tech products website with orange theme

requirements.text: Create homepage layout with orange tech product theme featuring hero section, product showcase, partner logos section, and contact information footer

quotes: website theme is orange tech product

acceptanceCriteria: Orange color scheme is consistently applied throughout the website
Layout includes distinct sections: hero, products, partners, contact
Design reflects modern tech product aesthetic

requirements.text: Add company information section displaying founder name 'Yash Jaiswal' and company name 'Zayora'
acceptanceCriteria: Founder name 'Yash Jaiswal' is prominently displayed
Company name 'Zayora' appears in header or hero section

requirements.text: Create product showcase section featuring bluetooth earbuds and smartwatch with product images

quotes: company product is bluetooth earbuds and Smart watch

acceptanceCriteria: Product cards or tiles display bluetooth earbuds
Product cards or tiles display smartwatch
Each product has an accompanying image

requirements.text: Add partner logos section displaying YouTube logo, Bharat Ke Founder logo, and MX Player logo in full color

quotes: add youtube logo and bharat ke founder logo and mx players logo in colour

acceptanceCriteria: YouTube logo is displayed in official brand colors
Bharat Ke Founder logo is displayed in color
MX Player logo is displayed in color

requirements.text: Add 'Coming Soon on Blinkit' section with Blinkit logo in color

acceptanceCriteria: Blinkit logo is displayed in official brand colors

Section is visually distinct from other content

requirements.text: Add contact information section displaying customer care number 9919031626 and email zayora11@gmail.com

Email zayora11@gmail.com is displayed and clickable as mailto link

requirements.text: Render all generated product images, partner logos, and brand assets as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are loaded from /assets/generated/ path

constraints: Orange must be the primary theme color throughout the design
All logos must maintain official brand colors
